features: SMELL BETTER EVERYWHERE - Odor control for pits, privates and beyond—think feet, underboob, belly buttons, tummy folds, butt cracks, thigh creases or anywhere else you have odor but wish you didn’t.
OUTRAGEOUSLY EFFECTIVE - Lume is clinically proven to block body odor all day and continues to control odor for 72 hours.
POWERED BY SCIENCE - Rather than covering up odor after it forms, our formula is pH optimized to block odor before it starts. You could even call us a PREodorant!
SERIOUSLY SAFE - Doctor developed and safe for any external use. Aluminum free, baking soda free, and paraben free. Hypoallergenic and skin safe for even our most sensitive parts.
LAVENDER SAGE - Lume’s original signature scent combines soothing lavender with a hint of clary sage. It’s a classic! Our Smooth Solid glides on smoothly anywhere you want to control odor.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pits, Privates & Beyond Outrageously Effective Whole Body Deodorant Odor is odor is odor—whether it comes from our underarms or undercarriages. Lume is uniquely made to control ALL external body odor. One deodorant is all you need for pits, underboobs, tummy folds, thigh creases, vulvas, butt cracks, feet & more! Our science based approach has raised the bar for personal hygiene. Lume’s innovative acidic formula is pH optimized to block odor before it begins. Certain traditional deodorants simply mask or neutralize odor after it forms.

Previous page Works Everywhere Blocks ALL unwanted odor—think pits, underboob, thigh creases, vulva, butt cracks, feet & more. Works Harder Clinically proven to block body odor all day and continues to control B.O. for 72 hours.* Works Smarter Lume’s innovative acidic formula is pH optimized to stop odor before it begins. Works Safely Doctor developed and safe for ALL your odor prone areas. Baking soda free. Next page Not an Ordinary Deodorant! 1 Works Everywhere 2 Works Harder 3 Works Smarter 4 Works Safely

Does Lume Deoodrant stain clothing? No. Lume’s cream and solid deodorants do not leave stains on clothing and will wash out easily with normal laundering. Our deodorant is aluminum free, which means the pits of your favorite white shirts won’t yellow over time. Is Lume Deodorant edible? While Lume is non-toxic, it is not considered edible and has an acidic taste. We recommend applying a trace amount to clean, dry skin a few times a week rather than immediately before intimacy. No need to wash off prior to intercourse or oral sex. Are Lume products safe to use during pregnancy & while breastfeeding? All Lume products are safe to use during pregnancy or while breastfeeding. Rest assured, Lume products were created by an OB/GYN with you in mind! Does Lume Deodorant require a pit detox? Lume does not require a transition period or detox to prevent irritation. Our low pH approach doesn’t lead to the irritation often seen with high pH deodorants, especially those made with baking soda.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My fave deodorant!
reviews.reviewText: I really like Lume’s clean, aluminum-free solid deodorant! It’s my favorite, more natural deodorant that I feel works well and keeps me dry and smelling good! A lot of natural deodorants don’t work as well, and you feel stinky before the day is done. I think I have tried most of the other brands! Lume solid works well for me, but everyone is different. I like the smell of the Peony Rose best, but there are other scents to choose from and an unscented as well. I will say, I only use this on my armpits. I know it’s advertised for all body parts, but I can only speak from the perspective of pits lol I also have sensitive skin and had no problems with this product. I did try the soft Lume deodorant as well, and the tube, but the traditional solid is my favorite and I feel works the best for me. Its seems like it’s gotten harder for me to find just a single of this deodorant in the Rose scent on Amazon, so I just got the 2-pack knowing it would last longer. Not sure why the single was so hard to get, maybe it’s been restocked since I last bought! I def recommend if you are looking for an aluminum free deodorant that actually works. It is a little more expensive than some other brands, but it was worth it to me bc of being so affective! I’ve been using this brand for well over a year if that tells you anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this! Smells great!
reviews.reviewText: I love this product and I have people ask what kind of perfume or powder I’m wearing. It’s a little pricey, but worth it for me.Now, the lotion is a whole ‘nother animal. I just received it today and it’s going into the trash. That stuff is disgusting. It smells nothing like the stick deodorant.I’ve recently had surgery and haven’t been able to shower very often, but with this, I don’t smell like it. Three days post-shower I still smell as fresh.I LOVE this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great deodorant! Improved since 2020!
reviews.reviewText: I used this back when it first came out. I’m happy to see that it is packaged as a solid stick and not a lotion pushed up through holes. The new peony rose is a nice addition and my preferred scent. For some reason, I don’t like the new citrus. But I am definitely reordering the peony! It keeps all odor away for 24 hours. It also does a decent job with reducing perspiration, surprisingly! I did need to reapply daily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't work like other Lume Products
reviews.reviewText: What I love about the previous Lume Products I've used is that their good bacteria to replace the stinky bacteria works. It might smell funny for a few minutes, but it works.These work like any regular stick deorderant. They do kill the smell. The lavender smells great. However, I don't think these are effective as the good bacteria version.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This deodorant is impressive! I did not have an odor as I was detoxing from aluminum based deodorant to this one. Fresh smell and I feel more confident. Lasts long and not overpowering. Can use everywhere!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells good works good
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves this deodorant. Shes 12. Eventhough its a little expensive, she says it works the best and is aluminum free which is important.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Better, but not good enough
reviews.reviewText: I sweat very easily and once my shirt gets wet, I have about 60 minutes before I notice body odor. Most products that claim to provide 24-48 hour protection don't work at all on me. I recently tried a product that works better than anything else I have tried, and essentially solves my problem, but they don't make an unscented version. So I decided to try this product. I like to wear fragrances and the scented deodorants make it difficult for me to enjoy the fragrance I'm wearing, especially if it's a fragrance that I haven't tried before. I live in South Carolina and I have to walk for about ten minutes to get from my car to my office, and I wear a backpack. Even in cooler weather I notice perspiration that is enough to dampen the armpits of my shirt. The same thing happened today while wearing this product, so it was a perfect test. Today I was able to leave work early, so I waited two hours and then went home, repeating the walk outside. I took my shirt off at home and it was definitely damp in the pits. However, I didn't notice any body odor on my armpits, and this product is virtually unscented, and I was able to enjoy the fragrance I was wearing. Unfortunately, my shirt didn't make it. For some reason the active ingredients in this unscented product can't prevent some body odor from developing in fabric. I will say that the odor was much less than I usually notice; I had to try hard to detect it, but it was definitely there, and that's just not good enough for me because I know that I can't make it through the day without freshening up. I have job interviews coming up that will last all day, and I have to travel, so I won't be taking this product on my trip. I wore a 100% cotton polo shirt, which usually does a little better than synthetic materials, and the scented product I use is able to kill the odor even after the shirt gets damp, so I'm going to stick with that. I think this would work well for short durations, or situations where you would only sweat a tiny bit, and have the opportunity to freshen up. So I'll still use it to try out new fragrances, but I won't buy it again for a long time, and I won't wear it to work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't last 72 hours, but does work well. The smell is nice and I don't get irritation like other products.
